description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国东部沿海的一个省份，省会南京。其名称由江宁府和苏州府合称而来。
description.en: A province in the eastern coastal region of the People's Republic of China, with its capital in Nanjing. Its name is derived from the combination of Jiangning Fu and Suzhou Fu.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物，现任江苏省委书记、省人大常委会主任。
description.en: A politician of the People's Republic of China, currently serving as the Party Secretary and Chairman of the Standing Committee of the People's Congress of Jiangsu Province.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物，现任江苏省省长。
description.en: A politician of the People's Republic of China, currently serving as the Governor of Jiangsu Province.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物，现任江苏省政协主席。
description.en: A politician of the People's Republic of China, currently serving as the Chairwoman of the Jiangsu Provincial Committee of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference.

description.zh-cn: 中国历史上最后一个封建王朝，由满族建立。
description.en: The last imperial dynasty of China, established by the Manchu people.

description.zh-cn: 清朝设立的省级行政机构，为江苏省的前身。
description.en: A provincial-level administrative body established during the Qing dynasty, the predecessor of Jiangsu Province.

description.zh-cn: 中国古代的一个行政区划，大致范围在今南京市。
description.en: An ancient administrative division in China, roughly corresponding to modern-day Nanjing.

description.zh-cn: 中国古代的一个行政区划，大致范围在今苏州市。
description.en: An ancient administrative division in China, roughly corresponding to modern-day Suzhou.

description.zh-cn: 春秋时期位于长江下游地区的诸侯国。
description.en: A vassal state during the Spring and Autumn period located in the lower Yangtze River region.

description.zh-cn: 春秋战国时期的诸侯国。
description.en: A vassal state during the Spring and Autumn and Warring States periods.

description.zh-cn: 春秋战国时期的诸侯国。
description.en: A vassal state during the Spring and Autumn and Warring States periods.

description.zh-cn: 秦末时期军事家，西楚霸王。
description.en: A military leader in the late Qin dynasty, the Hegemon-King of Western Chu.

description.zh-cn: 汉朝开国皇帝。
description.en: The founding emperor of the Han dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 汉景帝时期，由吴王刘濞等七个刘姓宗室诸侯王发动的叛乱。
description.en: A rebellion during the reign of Emperor Jing of Han, launched by seven vassal kings of the Liu imperial clan, led by Liu Pi, the King of Wu.

description.zh-cn: 汉初封的吴王，七国之乱的发起者。
description.en: The King of Wu enfeoffed in the early Han dynasty, initiator of the Rebellion of the Seven States.

description.zh-cn: 中国历史上于西晋灭亡后由晋朝皇室后裔在江南建立的政权。
description.en: A regime established in Jiangnan by descendants of the Jin imperial family after the fall of the Western Jin dynasty in Chinese history.

description.zh-cn: 东晋初年政治家，辅佐司马睿建立东晋。
description.en: A statesman in the early Eastern Jin dynasty who assisted Sima Rui in establishing the Eastern Jin.

description.zh-cn: 东晋的开国皇帝。
description.en: The founding emperor of the Eastern Jin dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 晚清时期由洪秀全建立的农民起义政权。
description.en: A peasant rebel state established by Hong Xiuquan during the late Qing dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 晚清时期湘军将领，曾国藩之弟。
description.en: A general of the Xiang Army during the late Qing dynasty, younger brother of Zeng Guofan.

description.zh-cn: 晚清时期政治家、军事家，湘军的创立者和统帅。
description.en: A statesman and military strategist in the late Qing dynasty, founder and commander of the Xiang Army.

description.zh-cn: 晚清时期由曾国藩组建的以湖南人为主的地方武装。
description.en: A regional army in the late Qing dynasty, primarily composed of people from Hunan, organized by Zeng Guofan.

description.zh-cn: 1864年7月，曾国荃率领的湘军攻破太平天国首都天京（南京）后进行的大规模屠杀和抢掠事件。
description.en: In July 1864, after the Xiang Army led by Zeng Guoquan captured Tianjing (Nanjing), the capital of the Taiping Heavenly Kingdom, a large-scale massacre and looting event occurred.

description.zh-cn: 清末民初政治人物，曾任江苏巡抚，在辛亥革命时宣布江苏独立。
description.en: A political figure during the late Qing and early Republican era, served as the governor of Jiangsu and declared its independence during the Xinhai Revolution.

description.zh-cn: 推翻清朝统治、建立中华民国的革命。
description.en: The revolution that overthrew the Qing dynasty and established the Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国政治家及军事家。
description.en: A Chinese politician and military leader of the Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国训政时期的中央政府与最高行政机关。
description.en: The central government and highest administrative body of the Republic of China during the political tutelage period.

description.zh-cn: 江苏省省会，曾为多个朝代的首都。
description.en: The capital of Jiangsu Province and has served as the capital for several dynasties.

description.zh-cn: 20世纪30年代至40年代，中国抵抗日本全面侵略的战争。
description.en: The war fought from the 1930s to the 1940s in which China resisted the full-scale invasion by Japan.

description.zh-cn: 抗日战争期间，侵华日军于南京犯下的大规模屠杀、强奸以及纵火、抢劫等战争罪行与反人类罪行。
description.en: War crimes and crimes against humanity, including mass murder, rape, arson, and looting, committed by the Imperial Japanese Army in Nanjing during the Second Sino-Japanese War.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党领导的在华中地区进行抗日战争的武装力量。
description.en: An armed force led by the Communist Party of China that fought against the Japanese in Central China.

description.zh-cn: 抗日战争时期，由新四军在江苏北部农村地区建立的抗日根据地。
description.en: An anti-Japanese base area established by the New Fourth Army in the rural areas of northern Jiangsu during the Second Sino-Japanese War.

description.zh-cn: 第二次国共内战中的一场决定性战役，在以徐州为中心的地区进行。
description.en: A decisive campaign during the Chinese Civil War, fought in the region centered around Xuzhou.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国的国家武装力量。
description.en: The armed forces of the Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国成立初期设立的省级行政区，管辖江苏省南部。
description.en: A provincial-level administrative region established in the early days of the People's Republic of China, governing the southern part of Jiangsu Province.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国成立初期设立的省级行政区，管辖江苏省北部。
description.en: A provincial-level administrative region established in the early days of the People's Republic of China, governing the northern part of Jiangsu Province.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国成立初期设立的直辖市。
description.en: A direct-controlled municipality established in the early days of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国成立初期的大行政区政府机构，管辖华东地区。
description.en: A major administrative region's governmental body in the early days of the People's Republic of China, governing the East China region.

description.zh-cn: 江苏省的省级国家行政机关。
description.en: The provincial-level state administrative organ of Jiangsu Province.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国成立初期的最高国家权力机关。
description.en: The highest state power organ in the early days of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 信长星担任江苏省委书记。
description.en: Xin Changxing serves as the Party Secretary of Jiangsu Province.

position.en: Chairman of the Standing Committee of the Provincial People's Congress

description.zh-cn: 信长星担任江苏省人大常委会主任。
description.en: Xin Changxing serves as the Chairman of the Standing Committee of the People's Congress of Jiangsu Province.

description.zh-cn: 刘小涛担任江苏省省长。
description.en: Liu Xiaotao serves as the Governor of Jiangsu Province.

position.en: Chairwoman of the Provincial CPPCC Committee

description.zh-cn: 张义珍担任江苏省政协主席。
description.en: Zhang Yizhen serves as the Chairwoman of the Jiangsu Provincial Committee of the CPPCC.

description.zh-cn: 清朝初年设置了江苏布政使司。
description.en: The Qing dynasty established the Jiangsu Provincial Administration Commission in its early years.

description.zh-cn: 江苏省的名称来源于江宁府和苏州府的首字合称。
description.en: The name of Jiangsu Province is derived from the combination of the first characters of Jiangning Fu and Suzhou Fu.

description.zh-cn: 江苏省的名称来源于江宁府和苏州府的首字合称。
description.en: The name of Jiangsu Province is derived from the combination of the first characters of Jiangning Fu and Suzhou Fu.

description.zh-cn: 春秋时期，吴国向西灭亡了楚国。
description.en: During the Spring and Autumn period, the State of Wu conquered the State of Chu to its west.

description.zh-cn: 春秋时期，吴国向南吞并了越国。
description.en: During the Spring and Autumn period, the State of Wu annexed the State of Yue to its south.

description.zh-cn: 公元前202年，刘邦率领的汉军在垓下击败项羽，导致其最终败亡。
description.en: In 202 BC, the Han army led by Liu Bang defeated Xiang Yu at Gaixia, leading to his eventual downfall.

description.zh-cn: 汉初吴王刘濞联合其他诸侯发动了七国之乱。
description.en: Liu Pi, the King of Wu in the early Han dynasty, launched the Rebellion of the Seven States in alliance with other vassal lords.

description.zh-cn: 317年，王导辅佐司马睿在建康（今南京）建立东晋。
description.en: In 317, Wang Dao assisted Sima Rui in establishing the Eastern Jin dynasty in Jiankang (modern-day Nanjing).

description.zh-cn: 317年，司马睿在王导辅佐下于建康（今南京）建立东晋。
description.en: In 317, Sima Rui, with the assistance of Wang Dao, established the Eastern Jin dynasty in Jiankang (modern-day Nanjing).

description.zh-cn: 晚清时期，太平天国运动重创了江苏南部地区。
description.en: During the late Qing dynasty, the Taiping Rebellion severely damaged the southern region of Jiangsu.

description.zh-cn: 曾国荃是曾国藩的弟弟。
description.en: Zeng Guoquan was the younger brother of Zeng Guofan.

description.zh-cn: 1864年7月，曾国荃率领湘军攻破天京（南京）后，发动了大规模的屠杀和抢掠。
description.en: In July 1864, after capturing Tianjing (Nanjing), Zeng Guoquan led the Xiang Army to carry out a large-scale massacre and looting.

description.zh-cn: 1864年7月，曾国荃率领的湘军攻破了太平天国首都天京（南京）。
description.en: In July 1864, the Xiang Army led by Zeng Guoquan captured Tianjing (Nanjing), the capital of the Taiping Heavenly Kingdom.

description.zh-cn: 辛亥革命爆发后，时任江苏巡抚程德全于1911年11月5日宣布江苏独立。
description.en: Following the outbreak of the Xinhai Revolution, Cheng Dequan, then governor of Jiangsu, declared Jiangsu's independence on November 5, 1911.

description.zh-cn: 1927年4月，蒋介石在南京另立国民政府。
description.en: In April 1927, Chiang Kai-shek established a separate Nationalist Government in Nanjing.

description.zh-cn: 抗日战争期间，日军于1937年12月13日攻陷南京后，发动了南京大屠杀。
description.en: During the Second Sino-Japanese War, after capturing Nanjing on December 13, 1937, the Japanese army launched the Nanjing Massacre.

description.zh-cn: 抗日战争期间，新四军主力进入苏北，建立了苏北抗日根据地。
description.en: During the Second Sino-Japanese War, the main force of the New Fourth Army entered northern Jiangsu and established the Northern Jiangsu Anti-Japanese Base Area.

description.zh-cn: 1948年底进行的淮海战役导致中华民国国军的败退。
description.en: The Huaihai Campaign, conducted in late 1948, resulted in the defeat and retreat of the Republic of China Armed Forces.

description.zh-cn: 到1950年时，苏南行政区政府机构属华东军政委员会。
description.en: By 1950, the government agency of the Sunan Administrative Region was subordinate to the East China Military and Political Committee.

description.zh-cn: 到1950年时，苏北行政区政府机构属华东军政委员会。
description.en: By 1950, the government agency of the Subei Administrative Region was subordinate to the East China Military and Political Committee.

description.zh-cn: 到1950年时，南京直辖市政府机构属华东军政委员会。
description.en: By 1950, the government agency of the Nanjing Direct-Controlled Municipality was subordinate to the East China Military and Political Committee.

description.zh-cn: 1952年11月15日，中央人民政府委员会通过决议，新设江苏省人民政府。
description.en: On November 15, 1952, the Central People's Government Council passed a resolution to establish the Jiangsu Provincial People's Government.

description.zh-cn: 苏南行政区的辖区与苏北行政区、南京直辖市合并为新的江苏省。
description.en: The jurisdiction of the Sunan Administrative Region was merged with the Subei Administrative Region and the Nanjing Direct-Controlled Municipality to form the new Jiangsu Province.

description.zh-cn: 苏北行政区的辖区与苏南行政区、南京直辖市合并为新的江苏省。
description.en: The jurisdiction of the Subei Administrative Region was merged with the Sunan Administrative Region and the Nanjing Direct-Controlled Municipality to form the new Jiangsu Province.

description.zh-cn: 南京直辖市的辖区与苏南、苏北行政区合并为新的江苏省，并降为省辖市。
description.en: The jurisdiction of the Nanjing Direct-Controlled Municipality was merged with the Sunan and Subei Administrative Regions to form the new Jiangsu Province, and it was downgraded to a provincially-administered city.
